message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is designed to revolutionize your business operations. It comes with cutting-edge features and unparalleled support. For this exceptional opportunity, I am offering it at an exclusive price of $750000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $600000. Can you meet me at this price?

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I appreciate your feedback and understand your budget constraints. I am willing to consider your proposal, and I would like to counteroffer at $650000 for the product.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $620000. Can you meet me at this price?
I understand your position, Bob, and I'm glad you're still interested in the product. I am willing to negotiate further. My counteroffer is $635000 for the product.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $610000. Can you meet me at this price?
Considering your continued interest, I am willing to counteroffer at $625000 for the product. This price reflects the value we place on your business partnership.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $595000. Can you meet me at this price?
Taking into account your latest offer, I am willing to consider a counteroffer at $615000 for the product. This price acknowledges both the value of the product and your budgetary considerations.
This is my final offer. I'm willing to pay $590000 for the product. I'm not willing to go any higher.
